name: We See Eye to Eye
description:
Art by Zack Kitakka, Programming, Design, and Sound by Kurt Roembke

Created as an entry for Radical Gallery's monthly art prompt to keep artists active during Covid-19 shelter in place in Fort Wayne, IN.

Theme was Idioms, and Zack and I decided to make a game based on We See Eye to Eye.

Shift the left image up and down, and left to right using the arrow keys on your keyboard to match them.

HTML  optimization was a bit funky so if it’s giving you problems, please download below!!  Mac and PC versions are smooth!
